sentences.sContent: The poem does not eulogize the dead soldiers.
sentences.sCn: 这首诗并未歌颂阵亡的士兵。

sentences.sContent: Commentators are eulogizing about the 17-year-old left-hander.
sentences.sCn: 解说员都在夸赞这位17岁的左撇子选手。

remMethod.val: eu(好的) + log(说) + ize → 说好话 → 称赞

trans.tranOther: to praise someone or something very much
